label: 藤原茂明
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: [Also Mochiakira] (dates unknown, active early twelfth century). Son of Atsumoto. Brother of Chikamitsu and Yoshiaki. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (57), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (1), and Kyūreishū. There exists a copy of the Hakushi monjū in his hand (the Kanda-bon Hakushi monjū 神田本白氏文集). [敦基、周光、令明、漢詩、鳩嶺集]
